tool_description: Identifies the format and type of document files based on file extension, MIME type, and content analysis to route to appropriate extraction tools.

file_path.description: Path to the document file to analyze

include_confidence.description: Whether to include confidence scores for format detection

error_messages: File not found: The specified file path does not exist or is not accessible.
Unsupported file format: The file format cannot be determined or is not supported.
File access denied: Insufficient permissions to read the specified file.
usage: Provide the file_path parameter pointing to a document file. Optionally set include_confidence to true for detailed format detection scores.

detected_format.description: The detected document format (pdf, docx, txt, html, image, etc.)

mime_type.description: MIME type of the detected format
